jd: Hi We are looking candidate for the below position. if you are interested, please share your resume at binod.kumar@tanishasystems.com Role: Java backend Developer with MongoDBLocation: Plano, TX / Jersey City, NJ ( Days Onsite) Job Description:10+ years of overall experience in software engineering7+ years of experience in Java, J2EE programming, Spring Framework and design techniques and web applications/REST APIsVery strong Mongo DB Exp, there would be coding interview. Hands on with version control practices, Continuous Integration tools e.g. JenkinsKnowledge of cloud technologies – AWS, GoogleUnderstanding of relational databases e.g. Oracle, MS Sql ServerExposure to Agile based software development Following MongoDB specific capabilities:Designing and customizing MongoDB applicationsImplementing database updates and migrationDebugging and troubleshooting when issues ariseAnalyzing databases and advising on optimizing performanceUnderstanding of back-up and disaster recovery plansGood to have knowledge of big data platforms e.g., Cassandra, Hadoop, Mark logic etc.
